description: 859 Other Business Services not Elsewhere Specified
extraDescription: Manage a variety of competitive processes and provide strategic staffing advice to Social Security Tribunal senior management
comments: This is a notice of the restatement of Contract 100004785 dated November 02, 2015. The contract was not captured by our financial system and the issue has been corrected since then. For a contract with task authorizations, the realized amount of the contract is contingent on the number of task authorizations issued and may be less than the amount proactively disclosed, dependent on the operational requirements of the department.
